response.content:
Hi Leo,
If you read the description carefully, I have already explained that this is for a total beginner and who doesn't want to go much in technical depth but wants to build a website like sanjeevjaiswal.com I will only explain how I build this website using Hugo based on the online resources/tutorials. If anyone has expectations more than that must refer advanced courses on udemy.

results.content_html: I feel dumb paying for a course that is no better delivered than a free youtube hugo tutorial.

results.content: This course barely takes you through what is easily available in the Hugo documentation. I expected more than that. I would have been helpful for the instructor to lead me through creating and managing my own templates, as well as creating various data types and files.
